This volatility is deeply intertwined with an escalating economic warfare, as demonstrated by President Trump's new sanctions on Russian oil giants (NPR, The New York Times). Such strategies invariably fuel trade and supply chain stress, as nations like China engage in their own 'sanctions gambit' (AEI), disrupting global commerce.
